Module 2: Unit 8: Recursion Fibonacci

Code

# FIBONACCI NUMBER
def fibonacci(n):
    """Calculate Fibonacci numbers"""
    if n <= 1:
        return n
    else:
        return(fibonacci(n-1) + fibonacci(n-2))

print "Fibonacci of 3"
print(fibonacci(3))
print "Fibonacci of 0"
print(fibonacci(0))
print "Fibonacci of 8"
print(fibonacci(8))
print "Fibonacci of 30"
print(fibonacci(30))

Output:

Fibonacci of 0

Fibonacci of 30
